Detailed Description

Session file for XINX project.

A XinxProjectSession2 class is a special object used in the same time of the project file for storing tempory informations. The second version of the project session is stored a SQL database. If the project doesn't exist the session exist but is stored in memory.

The new ContentView System used this project session, so when no project is defined the contentview is stored in memory, and continue to work.

The session is saved by commit in the database. For this session file be quick, the synchronisation with the disk is stopped. So the file can be corrupted easyly if XINX crash.
